task.title: Chamfer by Specify Length and Angle

context.p: You can chamfer objects by specifying a start point and an angle. To chamfer two objects using the distance-angle method

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Chamfer from the mainmenu.
On the command line, type A (Angle).
Specify chamfer length on the first line.
Specify chamfer angle from the first line.
Select the first object to chamfer.
Select the second object to chamfer.

result.p: Left: Select the first (A) and second (B) objects
Right: The chamfer is drawn, based on the distance (C) and the angle (D)
